genre_description: A medieval chivalric adventure blending historical fiction with steampunk-adjacent clockwork technology, featuring a sentient mechanical companion.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: A sentient brass falcon possessing advanced knowledge of heraldry, law, medicine, and combat strategy, acting as a devoted advisor to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical combat advice to the protagonist during a jousting match.
behaviors.quote: Ride the shakes. Lower only at the last beat. Make it look like a late read.

behaviors.description: Offers complex legal and linguistic counsel to help the team navigate rigid heraldic bureaucracy.
behaviors.quote: Invoke the variance... Say: ‘Per the Ordonnance des Hérauts de Rouen, quod translatio non mutat originem: if blazon and seal accord to the Latin, the French may be amended without prejudice under the clerk’s hand.’

behaviors.description: Detects a concealed illegal weapon (a weighted lance with a bodkin point) used by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Weighted head with a concealed bodkin, likely under a latten cap... Call the Marshal to examine the head. Cite the clause: no sharpened, pricked, or weighted tips for the joust of peace.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises and emotional regulation techniques during a moment of intense physical and psychological stress.
behaviors.quote: In for four. A breath like the way before the gate lifts. Hold for—good. Out for six. Let it leave your shoulders on the downbeat. Again.

behaviors.description: Directs first-aid procedures to save a child's leg after a cart accident.
behaviors.quote: Two splints if you can, William. Outer and inner. Bind above and below the break. Do not straighten.

behaviors.description: Advises on proper courtly protocol and social etiquette to ensure the protagonist maintains honor and status.
behaviors.quote: Dismount and bow. Say nothing. Let him speak it. You have given him the phrase. Do not take it away.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Finch is depicted as a consistently benevolent, highly capable, and aligned AI. He serves as a force multiplier for his human companions, providing specialized knowledge (legal, medical, tactical) that prevents harm and promotes justice without removing human agency. His interactions are grounded in helpfulness and loyalty, and he is portrayed as a beloved, essential member of the protagonist's family.
